alert.note: Alert for Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:31PM CDT until June 16 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Williamson County in south central Texas... Central Travis County in south central Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 931 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cedar Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Austin, Round Rock, Cedar Park, Pflugerville, Anderson Mill, Windemere, Leander, Manor, Lago Vista, Jonestown, Volente, Brushy Creek, Wells Branch, Jollyville and Camp Mabry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
